p.note: When you run the following command, you are requesting a new X.509 and a corresponding private key. You cannot retrieve an existing private key.

context.p: To generate a set of credentials:

step.cmd: Get administrator credentials and source eucarc:

info.codeblock: /usr/sbin/euca_conf --get-credentials admin.zip unzip admin.zip chmod 0600 * source eucarc
